name: monke throw banana
description:
you just a monkey who throws bananas at people who are throwing rocks at you for some reason. don't get hit by rock or monke get sad. get a combo and throw big bananas.

not my music obviously: GCN DK Mountain (Mario kart Wii you should know this)

Share it with people you think might like it, or don't I can't make you. if you want you can take a look at my other 'games' i made. lemme know what you think of this thing :)
